name: Bugs (itch) (Ache Games (H-Games))
description:
BUGS

Year 3045 on Mars.

We have found magical creatures on very distanced planet and we are able to use those creatures to defend our species from the Alien bugs invasion.

Kill all the bugs and save our population.

CONTROL

movement  ---  W,A,S,D

jump      Space Key

GORILLA STONE CREATURE

Smash Attack   ---  Mouse Left Click

SNAKE STONE CREATURE

Shoot Gem   ---  Mouse Left Click

Tail Attack  --- Mouse Right Click

IN HUNTING ZONE

Damage the creatures and then capture them.

Shoot    ---   Mouse Left Click

Capture  ---        Mouse Right Click
